Interface LegacyFormatSource

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentSource, MessageSource<Component>

public interface LegacyFormatSource extends ComponentSource
An interface that converting the string to Component using LegacyComponentSerializer.

    • create

      @Contract("_ -> new") @NotNull static @NotNull LegacyFormatSource create(@NotNull @NotNull StringMessageSource source)
      Creates a LegacyFormatSource with StringMessageSource.

      The created LegacyFormatSource uses LegacyComponentSerializer.legacyAmpersand().

      Parameters:
      source - the source of the string messages
      Returns:
      new LegacyFormatSource

    • getMessage

      @NotNull @NotNull Component getMessage(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> replacements)
      Gets the message that replaced specified characters.

      The placeholders will be replaced using String.replace(CharSequence, CharSequence).

      Parameters:
      key - the key to get the message
      replacements - the replacements
      Returns:
      the message that replaced specified characters
